mapper.update: INSERT ALL INTO member1(memberIdx, userId, userName, userPwd, enabled, created_date, modify_date) VALUES (#{memberIdx}, #{userId}, #{userName}, #{userPwd}, 1, SYSDATE, SYSDATE) INTO member2(userId, birth, email, tel, zip, addr1, addr2) VALUES (#{userId}, #{birth}, #{email}, #{tel}, #{zip, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addr1, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addr2, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) SELECT * FROM dual
mapper.select: SELECT memberIdx, m1.userId, userName, userPwd, enabled, created_date, modify_date, last_login ,TO_CHAR(birth, 'YYYY-MM-DD') birth, email, tel, zip, addr1, addr2 FROM member1 m1 LEFT OUTER JOIN member2 m2 ON m1.userId = m2.userId WHERE m1.userId = #{userId}
